con:interface.name: Swagger API Definition - Vehicle Domain - v2
con:interface.con:description: Provides API Services for the integration of Vehicle Endpoints (v2) Home

con:part.con:content:
swagger: '2.0' info: version: v2 title: Swagger API Definition - Vehicle Domain - v2 description: | Provides API Services for the integration of Vehicle Endpoints (v2) Home host: oemil.volkswagen.de basePath: /services schemes: - https produces: - application/json - application/problem+json - image/jpg - image/jpeg - image/png parameters: oemil-client-app: name: oemil-client-app in: header description: > Predefined indicator for the application that is calling the OEM.IL. Needs to correspond to an entry in the OEM.IL internal list of valid client applications. Please ask OEM.IL Support for oemil-client-app - single application: \ - platform application: \_\ The security gateway will extract the client-application from the token and add this header to the request by using that value. If both is present, a application value in the token and this http header, then the http header will override the token's application value, i.e. an existing "oemil-client-app" header will always be looped through to the API implementation. examples - VWConnect, CoVa, WCDP_ORU, WCDP_PDM required: true type: string x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true oemil-trace-id: name: oemil-trace-id in: header description: > Client generated UUID string which has been uniquely created for that request. Can be used for problem analysis in case of errors. required: true type: string maxLength: 255 x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true oemil-client-brand: name: oemil-client-brand in: header description: > The brand value of the OEM manufacturer to which the OEM.IL client belongs to. Expected to be a valid value as specified in the code list CL00441. If the client's brand is already part of the security token, that he brings, then this header is allowed to be omitted from the request. The security gateway will extract the brand from the token and add this header to the request by using that value. If both is present, a brand value in the token and this http header, the token's brand value will override the http header. #Brand derived from code list - CL00441 Brand (all brands inside and outside VW Group). Brand could be a part of the security token. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string x-code-list: CL00441 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.3 x-parameter-model: true oemil-client-country: name: oemil-client-country in: header description: > The country where the OEM.IL client is located. Expected as alpha-2 code of ISO3166-1. If the client's country is already part of the security token, that he brings, then this header is allowed to be omitted from the request. The security gateway will extract the country from the token and add this header to the request by using that value. If both is present, a country value in the token and this http header, the token's country value will override the http header. type: string required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true oemil-lee-country: name: oemil-lee-country in: header description: > Country in which the legal entity (LEE) is located according to ISO 3166, ALPHA-2-code, e.g. "CN" for China. If a CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute is mandatory. If no CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute will be ignored. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true oemil-lee-name: name: oemil-lee-name in: header description: > Code of the legal entity (LEE), e.g. Volkswagen Group has the legal entity code "000100". This means that in this example, the value of the attribute "oemil-lee-name" needs to be set to "000100". For example, all WCDP clients in Europe need to transmit this legal entity code. If a CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute is mandatory. If no CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute will be ignored. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true oemil-api-version: name: oemil-api-version in: header description: > This header parameter describes the version of the OEM.IL API. The endpoint paths do not contain the service version at all. The parameter substitutes the versioning path parameter. The host and base path of the endpoints do not change and the sourcing will be managed by the "oemil-api-version" header. Please note that this header only references to the OEM.IL release version. type: string required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true accept-language: name: accept-language in: header description: > Multi-part string identifier for a language according to IETF RFC4646 (e.g. de, de-DE, de-Latn-DE, de-Latn-DE-1996). The OEM.IL falls back to its own default language when the requested language is unavailable. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true Authorization: name: Authorization in: header description: Bearer Authorization Token type: string maxLength: 1024 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true Range: name: Range in: header description: > The Range HTTP request header indicates the part of a document that OEM.IL should return. Example1: bytes=1024- (requesting the document starting from byte 1024) Example2: bytes=0-1023 (requesting first 1024 bytes of the document) Example3: bytes=-1024 (requesting the last 1024 bytes of the document) type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true x-oem-source: name: x-oem-source in: header description: > This header parameter describes the connected data source system. If "oem" is used, then the data source system is the actual oem system, e.g. Version42 or Service42. If "mock" is used, then the data source system is OEM.IL based on a service virtualization solution of the corresponding service. The default value for this parameter is "oem". type: string default: oem enum: - oem - mock required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true vin: name: vin in: path description: Unique vehicle identification number of the OEM type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true download_id: name: download_id in: path description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) according to RFC 4122 to download object. type: string format: uuid required: true x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true processing_id: name: processing_id in: path description: Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation type: string format: uuid required: true x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true vins: name: vins in: query description: >- A list of unique vehicle identification number of the OEM. 50 VINs can be transmitted at maximum. type: array items: type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 required: true maxItems: 50 collectionFormat: csv x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true securityDefinitions: bearer: name: Authorization description: >- The Bearer authentication scheme was originally created as part of OAuth 2.0 in RFC 6750. type: apiKey in: header responses: '400': description: > Bad Request - The 400 (Bad Request) status code indicates that the server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing). schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '401': description: > The 401 (Unauthorized) status code indicates that the request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '403': description: > Forbidden - The 403 (Forbidden) status code indicates that the server understood the request but refuses to authorize it. The server that wishes to make public why the request has been forbidden will describe that reason in the response payload. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '404': description: > Not Found - The 404 (Not Found) status code indicates that the origin server did not find a current representation for the target resource or is not willing to disclose that one exists. A 404 status code does not indicate whether this lack of representation is temporary or permanent. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '408': description: > The 408 (Request Timeout) status code indicates that the server did not receive a complete request message within the time that it was prepared to wait. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '409': description: > Conflict - The 409 (Conflict) status code indicates that the request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource. [...] The server generate a payload that includes enough information to recognize the source of the conflict. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '429': description: > Too Many Requests - The 429 (Too Many Requests) status code indicates that the resource has been exhausted, perhaps a per-user quota, or perhaps the entire file system is out of space. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '501': description: > The 501 (Not Implemented) status code indicates that the server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '503': description: "The 503 (Service Unavailable) status code indicates that the server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overload or scheduled maintenance, which will likely be alleviated after some\_delay.\n" schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' default: description: > Internal server error - The 500 (Internal Server Error) status code indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' paths: /vehicles: get: description: Returns detailed information of all requested vehicles. tags: - 'Z:in_preparation' operationId: return_vehicles_ov2 produces: - application/json - application/problem+json externalDocs: description: At the following address the returned status codes are given. url: 'https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/vehicles/index.html' parameters: - e.g. '321.836 | 36.000 | 2' - in case of error rate-limit is optional/undefined - per day - per 15 minute time window - per 15 minute time window + vin type: string maxLength: 255 x-parameter-version: 1.5 x-parameter-model: true x-rate-limit-reset: description: > The remaining window before the rate limit resets in UTC epoch seconds. - The 'schemeID' attribute states the manufacturer who issued the numbers. If not stated VWGroup is assumed. type: string minLength: 3 maxLength: 3 example: AA1 diagnostic_address: description: >- For mechanical parts, this can be B (barcode) or S (system interface). For electronic control units this is a hex code of the address ('Baud-address') or the slave id (3 digits) or a 4 digit pseudo address if the ecu is not in Version42. type: string maxLength: 4 example: 1 description: description: Description of the component. type: string maxLength: 50 example: Motorelektronik 1 TNr type_id: description: >- This ID is indicating the type of the component. 01 for example is an engine control unit component. The source for this data is BG-online. type: string maxLength: 255 example: 9 component_data: description: Compressed data set defining the properties of the component. type: string maxLength: 30 example: 06J906027HD no_access_ind: description: >- Indicates whether access to the component data is denied (state 'true') or the component data is accessible (state 'false' or the field is omitted). If true the component data may be omitted or be empty. type: boolean example: false x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: false dealer_id_ov1_3: title: dealer_id description: > - unique identification of business partner in applications (e.g. DEUV74623) - only the combination of country, brand and partner number identifies a dealer uniquely type: object properties: country: description: > - Country - The country the dealer works in. Using ISO3166-1-3alpha codes (CL ISO3166-1-3alpha) type: string minLength: 3 maxLength: 3 example: DEU brand: description: > Brand of the dealer (CL00003 BrandCode Describes a brand within the Volkswagen Group) CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string minLength: 1 maxLength: 1 example: V x-code-list: >- CL00003 BrandCode Describes a brand within the Volkswagen Group. Abbreviation is used because the codes are common within the group. partner_number: description: > - Partner number - The partner number is a 5-digit alphanumeric string (e. g. AB623) given by the importer and only valid in the context of a brand and country. The partner number is stored in the group dealer partner system KVPS as partner nummer type: string minLength: 5 maxLength: 5 example: AB623 required: - country - brand - partner_number x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true dealer_ref_ov1_3: title: dealer_ref description: > - unique identification of business partner in applications e.g. dealer - only the combination of country, brand and partner number identifies a dealer uniquely - the dealer ref contains also the whole saler number as well as role of the dealer type: object properties: dealer_id: $ref: '#/definitions/dealer_id_ov1_3' whole_saler_number: description: >- The wholesaler number identifies a wholesaler. The WholesalerNumber is stored in the Group Importer System KVPS as BID. type: string maxLength: 3 example: V23 role: description: > Role of the dealer (e.g. 'Purchase', 'Delivery', 'Service', 'Agent'). CodeList - CL00007 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string maxLength: 255 example: Agent x-code-list: CL00007 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true equipment_option_ov1_3: title: equipment_option description: Full description of the equipment term. type: object properties: option_code: type: string maxLength: 255 description: > Code of the equipment, like PR Number (CL00364), Package Number, Maneck Code. The code is usually manufacturer dependent. Can be used for technical equipment (CL00324), interior equipmen(CL00322) and exterior equipment (CL00323). CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls example: B0A x-code-list: > - CL00364 PRNumber of a single equipment or an equipment family - CL00324 TechnicalEquipment Volkswagen Group internal reference code to assign the technical equipment based on the Maneck list. - CL00322 InteriorEquipment Volkswagen Group internal reference code to assign the interior equipment based on the Maneck list. - CL00323 ExteriorEquipment Volkswagen Group internal reference code to assign the exterior equipment based on the Maneck list. family: description: Label to group options type: string maxLength: 255 example: BLB equipment_class: type: string maxLength: 255 description: > Equipment class. - CL00045 - Allowed values are - B - regular equipment, relating to the base model - L - country or model specific equipment list - E - extra equipment - G - equipment packages/groups - P - equipment, which belongs to a packet - I - internal equipment (like engine or transmission) - O - other, not catalogued equipment, (with respect to the manufactures selling catalogue) CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls example: L x-code-list: CL00045 EquipmentClass description: description: Text description of the equipment term. type: string maxLength: 255 example: Bauteilesatz ohne lnderspezifische Bauvorschrift description_type: description: Type of description according to CL00193. type: string example: Marketing x-code-list: CL00193 Equipment Description Type x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true error_code_ov1_2: title: error_code description: Definition of the response error type: object properties: type: description: >- Identifies the problem type (e.g. URI) - It is the technical identifier for a type of faults. type: string maxLength: 4 oem_error_description: type: string description: Written description of the fault. maxLength: 4096 required: - type - title - status - detail x-object-version: 1.2 x-object-model: true error_code_ov1_3: title: error_code description: Definition of the response error type: object properties: type: description: >- Identifies the problem type (e.g. URI) - additional information of the http error type: string example: 'https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/index.html' title: description: Short message that describes the error type: string maxLength: 255 status: description: Http status codes of the error type: integer minimum: 100 maximum: 600 detail: description: Specific explanation of the occurred problem. type: string maxLength: 255 oem_error_code: description: >- Code of the fault. The server that wishes to make public why the request has been forbidden will describe that reason in the response payload. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ident_error_ov2' example: - parameter: name parameter_value: - FL_3Q0907530AB_6361_S.odx.zip error: type: >- https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/vehicles/ecus/flash-document-data/process/processing_id/index.html title: FORBIDDEN status: 403 detail: 7217 - Not allowed to access requested flash document. not_found: title: not_found description: > Not Found - The 404 (Not Found) status code indicates that the origin server did not find a current representation for the target resource or is not willing to disclose that one exists. A 404 status code does not indicate whether this lack of representation is temporary or permanent. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ident_error_ov2' example: - parameter: name parameter_value: - FL_3Q0907530AB_6361_S.odx.zip error: type: >- https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/vehicles/ecus/flash-document-data/process/processing_id/index.html title: NOT_FOUND status: 404 detail: 7218 - Requested flash document not found. internal_server_error: title: internal_server_error description: > The 500 (Internal Server Error) status code indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ident_error_ov2' example: - parameter: name parameter_value: - FL_3Q0907530AB_6361_S.odx.zip error: type: >- https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/vehicles/ecus/flash-document-data/process/processing_id/index.html title: INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR status: 500 detail: >- 7219 - Building of flash document container exceeds the maximum allowed file size. x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true flash_document_config_ov2: title: flash_document_config description: > Contains the configuration of which flash document containers should be created. type: object properties: document_ids: description: >- Search criteria for a list of unique document IDs in the corresponding OEM system. Either the parameter "ids" or "names" must be set. Otherwise an error is thrown. If both parameters are set, then they must contain the same number of items and they are linked via a logical AND operator according to their corresponding index, e.g. document ID 1 at index 1 is connected via AND operator to document name 1 at index 1. type: array items: type: integer example: - 10880886 - 10879565 document_names: description: >- Search criteria for a list of document names in the corresponding OEM system. Either the parameter "ids" or "names" must be set. Otherwise an error is thrown. If both parameters are set, then they must contain the same number of items and they are linked via a logical AND operator according to their corresponding index, e.g. document name 1 at index 1 is connected via AND operator to document ID 1 at index 1. type: array items: type: string example: - FL_85E035465_X060_PASDENTRY_V001.pdx - FL_3Q0907530AB_6361_S.odx x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true flash_document_container_ov2: title: flash_document_container description: Created flash document container type: object properties: name: description: Name of the created flash document container type: string example: FL_85E035465_X060_PASDENTRY_V001.pdx.zip download_id: description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation to download the flash document container. The file will be available at least for 7 days. type: string format: uuid example: 550e8400-e29b-11d4-a716-446655440000 download_expiration_date: description: Date and time when download expires type: string format: date-time example: '2021-01-22T10:08:54.932Z' doc_type_name: description: >- Document type of the flash document in a flash document container. The document type is needed to identify flash 2.0 flash documents. type: string example: SW-PDX odx_container_format: description: >- ODXContainerFormat of the flash document in a flash document container. The ODXContainerFormat is needed to identify flash 2.0 flash documents. type: string example: V4.3 flash_2_0: description: >- Indicates whether the flash document in a flash document container is a flash 2.0 flash document (=true) or not (=false). type: boolean example: true size: description: Size of flash document container rounded up in full MBs. type: integer example: 399 checksum: description: >- Message-Digest Algorithm 5 (MD5) hexadecimal checksum representation of the flash document in a flash document container. type: string maxLength: 32 example: 8b14ed616aa4213ff418c78f987b6a5d x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_document_container_status_ov2: title: flash_document_container_status description: Contains the results of flash document container creation type: object properties: processing_status: description: >- Current status ("OPEN", "IN_PROGRESS", "DONE" and "FAILED") of the process as enumeration. type: string enum: - OPEN - IN_PROGRESS - DONE - FAILED done_containers: description: >- Current number of processed flash document containers, which are ready for download type: integer example: 1 total_containers: description: >- Total number of flash document containers, that still have to be processed type: integer example: 2 flash_document_containers: description: List of created flash document containers type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/flash_document_container_ov2' required: - processing_status x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true ident_error_ov1_3: title: ident_error description: The incorrect unique identifier with reference to the error code type: object properties: parameter: description: The requested parameter of the object type: string parameter_value: description: The incorrect values according to the parameter type: array items: type: string error: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_3' required: - parameter - parameter_value - error x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true ident_error_ov2: title: ident_error description: The object of unique identifier with reference to the error code type: object properties: parameter: description: The unique identifier with reference to the error code type: string parameter_value: description: The value of unique identifier with reference to the error code type: array items: type: string error: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_3' required: - parameter - parameter_value - error x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true life_data_ov1_3: title: life_data description: Information concerning the life of the vehicle. type: object properties: status: description: > Vehicle status, regarding the whole lifetime (e.g. 'Built', 'Scheduled', 'Shipped', 'InTransit', 'Sold' 'KnockDown', 'Registered', 'Restricted', 'Recycled', 'Repair', 'Update') - CL00010 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: Built x-code-list: CL00010 time_line: $ref: '#/definitions/time_line_ov1_3' x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true model_ov1_3: title: model description: Technical properties of the vehicle type: object properties: model_name: description: >- Model name. Description as any text (e.g. Golf V6 4Motion). The 'languageID' attribute states the language used according to RFC4646 (e.g. de, de-DE, de-Latn-DE, de-Latn-DE-1996). type: string maxLength: 255 example: Golf V6 4Motion model_codes: description: > Model codes. Possible values are limited by the following definitions. - CL00027 (MBV) - selling code of the VW Group (e.g. 1J1RZ7 according to the MBV system) - CL00236 (ATLAS) - european type-approval number (e.g. e1*2001/116*0160*21) - CL00310 (Maneck) - Volkswagen Group internal reference code to model assignment based on the Maneck list - CL00442 (KUBA) - Coding for the Vehicle Model Type defined in KUBA - CL00356 (KBA) - model key (TSN) defined by German Federal Motor Vehicle Authority (Kraftfahrtbundesamt), which is only unique with the manufacturer key defined by KBA, DAT - vehicle main type according to the DAT organisation - CL01102 (MBT) - selling code of the VW Group according to the MBT system - CL01343 - Contains the Vehicle Model Code for Porsche CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: array items: type: string example: 1J1RZ7 x-code-list: 'CL00027, CL00236, CL00310, CL00442, CL00356, CL01102, CL01343' model_year: description: 'Model year, year of the edition (e.g. 2007).' type: integer example: 2007 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true telematic_device_ov1_3: title: telematic_device description: > Object that describe the equipped telematic device, which is interpreted from component information. (e.g. "OCU" is used by Volkswagen and is called Online Connectivity Unit, "cGW" is used by Audi and is called connected Gateway.) type: object properties: value: description: >- Telematic device value describes the interpreted component value [NOT_EQUIPPED_WITH, OCU1, OCU2, OCU3, cGW]. type: string x-extensible-enum: - NOT_EQUIPPED_WITH - OCU1 - OCU2 - OCU3 - cGW example: OCU3 sw_version: description: >- Software version describes the version of the software that is used for the telematic device. type: string minLength: 1 maxLength: 4 example: 1 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true time_line_ov1_3: title: time_line description: >- Remarkable dates of the vehicle. Most of them are related to an associated process or order, they may be saved here for further purpose. type: object properties: delivery_date: description: Date of fist delivery according to ISO8601 (e.g. 2007-12-10). type: string format: date-time example: '2007-12-10T00:00:00.000Z' production_date: description: Date of production according to ISO8601 (e.g. 2007-12-10). type: string format: date-time example: '2007-12-10T00:00:00.000Z' production_plant_name: description: Name of the production plant. type: string maxLength: 255 example: Wolfsburg production_plant_id: description: >- Identifier of the production plant. VW-Group identifier is assumed. If another identification schema is used, it must be stated using the 'schemeID' attribute. type: string maxLength: 4 example: 56 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true vehicle_ident_ov1_2: title: vehicle_ident description: >- The vehicle identifier define the group-wide platform and project definition of the vehicle. type: object properties: derivate: description: The derivate of the vehicle. type: string maxLength: 2 example: DR generation: description: Generation of the vehicle type: string maxLength: 4 example: AU57 project: description: Offical vehicle project definition. type: string maxLength: 6 example: AU572 x-object-version: 1.2 x-object-model: true color_ov1_6: title: color description: > Multiple vehicle color based on the type of the vehicle. - CL00028, CL00050, CL00312, CL00313 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: object properties: type: description: 'The type of the color according to finish, interior, top and paint.' type: string enum: - FINISH - INTERIOR - TOP - PAINT example: INTERIOR code: description: The color code of the type. type: string example: TO description: description: The color description of the type. type: string example: Titanschwarz/Titanschwarz/Titanschwarz/St.Tropez x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true drive_kind_ov1_6: title: drive_kind description: > Drive kind. Drive kind may be used to specify the drive as 'front wheel', 'rear wheel' or 'all-wheel' drive. The default value assumed is 'unknown', which also must be agreed if the attribute is not stated. - CL00037, CL00314, CL01291 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: object properties: code: description: Drive kind (code) of the vehicle. type: string example: F description: description: Drive kind (description) of the vehicle. type: string example: FRONT_WHEEL x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true engine_ov1_6: title: engine description: engine data type: object properties: engine_code: description: > The two- or three-digit engine code (e.g. BFH). - CL00029 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: CKU x-code-list: CL00029 engine_code_extension: description: > Extension to the engine code (optional). - CL00030 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: B x-code-list: CL00030 engine_type: description: > Engine type as an abstract description like EM (emission motor) or DM (diesel motor). - CL00031, CL00316, CL01296 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: PetrolMotor x-code-list: 'CL00031, CL00316, CL01296' engine_description: description: >- Description of the engine. This attribute is influenced by the "accept-language" according to RFC4646. type: string maxLength: 4096 example: 2.5 L TDI combustion_mode: description: The principle of how the combustion is initiated according to CL01292. type: string example: O x-code-list: >- CL01292 The way/principle the combustion is initiated - managed externally by FAM fuel_types: description: > Code for the fuel type used in this model. - CL00023, CL00317, CL01305 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: array items: description: This object describes the fuel type. type: object properties: code: description: The code of the fuel type. type: string example: 'N' description: description: The name of the fuel type type: string example: regular petrol x-code-list: 'CL00023, CL00317, CL01305' cylinder_count: description: Count of cylinders. type: integer format: int8 minimum: 1 maximum: 16 example: 4 capacity: description: > - value related to the capacity unit of the vehicle engine - Capacity (e.g. 3200). The 'unit' attribute states the unit of measure. - Permittable values are determined by content of the codelist CL00124 type: number format: int16 minimum: 0 example: 3200 capacity_unit: description: > - unit related to the capacity value of the vehicle engine - Unit of measure of the measure type value. - Values allowed in the 'unit' attribute are determined by one of the code lists - CL00124 Volume units, Weight units, Length units, Liquid volume units, Odometer reading units, Consumption units,Emission units, Power units, Time units, Packaging units - CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string maxLength: 255 example: ccm x-code-list: - CL00124 VolumeUnitCodeCodelist Non liquid volume units of measure power: description: Value related to the power unit of the vehicle engine type: number format: int16 minimum: 0 example: 183 power_unit: description: > The 'unit' attribute states the unit of engine power measure. Permittable values are determined by content of the codelist CL00181. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: hp x-code-list: CL00181 torque: description: > Engine torque (e.g. 500). The 'unit' attribute states the unit of measure. Permittable values are determined by content of the codelist CL01270. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: integer format: int16 minimum: 0 example: 500 x-code-list: CL01270 torque_unit: description: > Unit of measure of the measure type value. Values allowed in the 'unit' attribute are determined by one of the code lists Volume units, Weight units, Length units, Liquid volume units, Odometer reading units, Consumption units, Emission units, Power units, Time units, Packaging units - CL01270 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: Nm x-code-list: CL01270 x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true sim_ov1_6: title: sim description: Object contains several SIM card IDs. type: object properties: imei: description: >- The International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) is a unique numerical identifier for every mobile device. A standard IMEI number is a 14 digit string, with an additional 15th check digit for verifying the entire string. type: string maxLength: 15 example: '212345678901234' imsi: description: >- An International Mobile Subscriber Identity (IMSI) is a unique number, usually fifteen digits, associated with the Global System for Mobile Communications (GSM) and the Universal Mobile Telecommunications System (UMTS) network mobile phone users. The IMSI is a unique number identifying a GSM subscriber. type: string maxLength: 15 example: '262019876543210' iccid: description: >- The Integrated Circuit Card Identifier (ICCID) identifies each SIM internationally. type: string maxLength: 20 example: '21234567890123456789' euiccid: description: >- The embedded Universal Integrated Circuit Card Identifier (eUICCID) is the unique identifier of the embedded SIM card. type: string maxLength: 32 example: '12345678901234567890123456789012' x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true transmission_ov1_6: title: transmission description: transmission data type: object properties: code: description: > The two- or three-digit transmission code (e.g. FMP or FGT, if the kind is AWD). - CL00035 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: FMP x-code-list: CL00035 kind: description: > Kind of transmission (e.g. 'AdditionalTransmission', 'MainTransmission'). - CL00025 type: string example: MainTransmission x-code-list: CL00025 type: description: > List of type of transmission as an abstract definition. - CL00036, CL00319, CL01295 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: array items: description: transmission type of the vehicle type: object properties: code: description: The code of the transmission. type: string example: M description: description: Readable transmission description. type: string example: manual transmission x-code-list: 'CL00036, CL00319, CL01295' description: description: Readable transmission description. type: string example: Manual x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true ecu_key_value_ov1: title: ecu_key_value type: object properties: key: description: Represents the key that need to be added to the ECU parameter file type: string maxLength: 50 example: T_NRC_Delay value: description: >- Represents the value to the corresponding key that need to be added to the ECU parameter file type: string maxLength: 50 example: 500 required: - key - value x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true ecu_meta_ov1: title: ecu_meta_info description: >- Contains the meta information of the ECU source state respectively the ECU target state. type: object properties: logical_sw_block_version: description: >- Data identifier as hexadecimal code, which is used to indicate the logical software blocks (1-n) of a server. type: string maxLength: 2048 example: 30 30 32 30 30 31 36 30 30 30 32 35 30 30 30 35 downgrade_protection_target: description: >- Target version of the downgrade protection mechanism of the blocks (1-n) of a server as hexadecimal code. type: string maxLength: 2048 example: >- 01 30 30 30 35 30 30 30 36 30 30 30 35 30 30 30 36 30 30 30 35 30 30 30 35 fds_project_id: description: >- Unique identification information as hexadecimal code to determine the Flash Data Security (FDS) project ID. type: string maxLength: 4 example: 1019 x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_document_ov1: title: flash_document description: Concrete flash document object. type: object properties: document_id: description: ID of the flash document. type: integer example: 12684215 document_name: description: Name of the flash document. type: string example: FL_10B919608D_0122_ARHUD_V001_E.odx x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_document_data_information_ov1: title: flash_documents description: List of flash document(s). type: object properties: flash_documents: type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/flash_document_ov1' required: - flash_documents x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_element_ov1: title: flash_element type: object properties: order: description: > Order of the flash elements. The order number is used to compare flash software, which is required for bootloader updates. If the number of corresponding source and target softwares is not equal, a partial flash is not possible. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES a comparison of target software between different order numbers is done. * e.g. the first source flash softwares must be compared to the first target flash softwares. * e.g. the second source flash softwares to the second target flash softwares. * e.g. the first target flash softwares can be compared to the second target flash softwares. type: integer example: 1 source_sg_version_id: description: >- ID to check whether the (source) approval for the ECU is available. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES this attribute can be ignored. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 10330791 source_sw_version_id: description: >- OEM specific ID to retrieve the corresponding source version. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES this attribute can be ignored. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 10222781 target_sg_version_id: description: ID to check whether the (target) approval for the ECU is available. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 10422344 target_sw_version_id: description: OEM specific ID to retrieve the corresponding target version. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 10191592 target_document_id: description: ID for document to retrieve a specific file from OEM system. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 11341440 required: - order x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_sw_ov1: title: flash_sw description: >- Container for the definition of the source and target flash software. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES only target flash software information is necessary. type: object properties: source_container_name: description: > Name of source flash container, which should be considered for the flash container creation process. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES this attribute can be ignored. Choose a name for the source flash container. The name is defined without file ending (e.g. "zip") and will be used for further process steps to provide the final flash container(s). type: string maxLength: 100 example: 4N0907777B_H51_4N0907777Q_2013 target_container_name: description: > Name of target flash container, which should be considered for the flash container creation process Choose a name for the target flash container. The name is defined without file ending (e.g. "zip") and will be used for further process steps to provide the final flash container(s). type: string maxLength: 100 example: 4N0907777B_H51_4N0907777AE_2016 flash_elements: description: List of flash software. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/flash_element_ov1' target_ecu_parameters: description: >- A list of key value pairs which constitute the content of the ECU parameter file of the target ECU packages (full forward and/or partial forward). If the ECU_parameters is not set an empty txt with the name ECU_parameters.txt shall be added to the flash container. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_key_value_ov1' source_ecu_parameters: description: >- A list of key value pairs which constitute the content of the ECU parameter file of the source ECU packages (rollback and/or partial rollback). If the ECU_parameters is not set an empty txt with the name ECU_parameters.txt shall be added to the flash container. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES this attribute can be ignored. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_key_value_ov1' required: - flash_elements x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true processing_id_ov1: title: processing_id description: 'Contains a processing information, which can be used for status request' type: object properties: processing_id: title: processing_id description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation. OEM.IL will always create an individual processing_id which will also be used for later feedback. type: string format: uuid example: 550e8400-e29b-11d4-a716-446655440000 x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true affiliation_ov2: title: affiliation description: The affiliation contains the last known vehicle context. type: object properties: context: description: >- The context of the vehicle contains the allocation in private or fleet. If the vehicle is not allocated the context will be unknown [PRIVATE, FLEET, UNKNOWN]. type: string enum: - PRIVATE - FLEET - UNKNOWN recorded_at: description: Timestamp of the recorded status. type: string format: date-time example: '2015-05-28T14:07:17.000Z' required: - context x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true ecu_meta_ov2: title: ecu_meta_info description: >- Contains the meta information of the ECU source state respectively the ECU target state. type: object properties: order: description: > Order of the flash elements. The order number is used to compare source and target flash software, which is required for bootloader updates. If the number of corresponding source and target softwares is not equal, a partial flash is not possible. * e.g. the first source flash softwares must be compared to the first target flash softwares. * e.g. the second source flash softwares to the second target flash softwares, etc. type: integer example: 1 logical_sw_block_version: description: >- Data identifier as hexadecimal code, which is used to indicate the logical software blocks (1-n) of a server. type: string maxLength: 2048 example: 30 30 32 30 30 31 36 30 30 30 32 35 30 30 30 35 downgrade_protection_target: description: >- Target version of the downgrade protection mechanism of the blocks (1-n) of a server as hexadecimal code. type: string maxLength: 2048 example: >- 01 30 30 30 35 30 30 30 36 30 30 30 35 30 30 30 36 30 30 30 35 30 30 30 35 fds_project_id: description: >- Unique identification information as hexadecimal code to determine the Flash Data Security (FDS) project ID. type: string maxLength: 4 example: 1019 x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true ecu_model_ov2: title: ecu_model description: Concrete ECU model type: object properties: gsg_name: type: string description: | Name of the basic control module (in German: "Grundsteuergert") example: LED-Leimo PLUS MAX diagnostic_addresses: description: List of diagnostic addresses type: array items: description: Address of Electronic Control Unit (ECU) as 4-digit hexadecimal code type: string maxLength: 4 example: 006D sg_version_id: description: Identifier of the ECU type: string example: 10491359 sgv_status_id: description: > Status ID related to the approval of the usage of the control module (in German: "Steuergerte Verwendungsgenehmigung"), * e.g. "200" for "OPEN" * e.g. "201" for "PREPARED" * e.g. "261" for "RELEASED_KD" type: integer maxLength: 3 example: 200 spare_part_number: description: > Identifier to determine the VOLKSWAGEN AG spare part number of an ECU (in German: "VW/Audi-Teilenummer") without dots and without ending spaces type: string maxLength: 18 example: 992941572AA hw_version_id: description: ECU hardware version identifier type: string maxLength: 255 example: 10141877 ecu_part_number: description: > Identifier to determine the reference ECU hardware and the compatibility of the ECU hardware (in German: "Hardware Referenz-Teilenummer") without dots and without ending spaces type: string maxLength: 18 example: 992941572A hw_version_number: description: Version of the hardware as 3-digit code type: string maxLength: 255 example: H08 sw_version_id: description: ECU software version identifier type: string maxLength: 255 example: 10231063 sw_version_number: description: Version of the software as 4-digit code type: string maxLength: 255 example: 9002 x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true ecu_models_ov2: title: ecu_models description: List of ECU models type: object properties: ecu_models: type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_model_ov2' offset: description: > Offset (start pointer) of ECU models returned. Start Pointer (paging) is depending on attribute "limit". If no value is defined, then value is set to 0 per default. type: integer default: 0 example: 0 limit: description: > Maximum number of ECU models returned in the response at once. If no value is defined, then value is set to 5000 per default. type: integer default: 5000 example: 5000 total: description: 'Total number of available ECU models, which are returned.' type: integer example: 1511 required: - ecu_models x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true flash_config_ov2: title: flash_config description: > Contains the configurations and instructions how and what flash container shall be created. type: object properties: vehicle_product_key: description: key of vehicle product type: string maxLength: 4 example: 10A ecu_metadata_type: description: > Type of ecu meta data Choose one of the enumeration values to determine the type of ecu meta information, which should be requested. If no value is chosen, no ecu metadata is requested. * e.g. choose value "SOURCE", if the source meta information should be requested. The source meta information is those kind of meta information, which has the lowest order number. * e.g. choose value "TARGET", if the target meta information should be requested. The target metainformation is those kind of meta information, which has the highest order number. * e.g. choose "ALL", if both source meta information and target meta information should be requested. type: string enum: - SOURCE - TARGET - ALL container_types: description: > List of types of flash containers Case 1: only one flash element is given Choose one or more of the enumeration values to determine the type of flash container, which should be requested. Choose values with the prefix "FULL" respectively "PARTIAL", if a full respectively patial flash container should be created, signed and transferred for the ECU state or choose values with the suffix "SOURCE" respectively "TARGET", if a source repsectively target flash container should be created, signed and transferred for the ECU state. Choose "ALL" as short way to request all combinations at maximum. If no value is chosen, no flash data container is requested. Allowed container types: * "PARTIAL_SOURCE": choose "PARTIAL_SOURCE", if a partial source flash container should be created. * "FULL_SOURCE": choose "FULL_SOURCE", if a full source flash container should be created. * "PARTIAL_TARGET": choose "PARTIAL_TARGET", if a partial target flash container should be created. * "FULL_TARGET": choose "FULL_TARGET", if a full target flash container should be created. * "ALL": choose "ALL", if all four enumeration combinations should be requested. Case 2: two or three flash elements starting with order 1 are given Allowed container types: * "FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES": choose "FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES", if a full target flash files flash container should be created. type: array items: type: string enum: - PARTIAL_SOURCE - FULL_SOURCE - PARTIAL_TARGET - FULL_TARGET - ALL - FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES signing_algorithm: description: >- Name of the signing algorithm that shall be executed as enumeration, e.g. ECC 256 (NIST P-256). type: string enum: - ECC 256 (NIST P-256) flash_sw: $ref: '#/definitions/flash_sw_ov1' required: - vehicle_product_key - signing_algorithm x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true flash_container_ov2: title: flash_container description: Created flash container type: object properties: creation_type: description: > Type of created flash container. The type of created flash container is defined as enumeration. If the type of flash container is not defined, then no flash container was created. type: string enum: - PARTIAL_SOURCE - FULL_SOURCE - PARTIAL_TARGET - FULL_TARGET - FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES container_name: description: >- Name of the source or target flash container, that was initially transferred in the request. type: string maxLength: 100 example: 4N0907777B_H51_4N0907777Q_2013 download_id: description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation to download the signed (partial) flash container. The file must be available at least for 7 days. type: string format: uuid example: 550e8400-e29b-11d4-a716-446655440000 download_expiration_date: description: Date and time when download expires type: string format: date-time package_size: description: >- Size of all flash blocks in the (partial) flash container rounded up in full MBs. type: integer example: 399 checksum: description: >- Message-Digest Algorithm 5 (MD5) checksum hexadecimal representation of the created file. type: string maxLength: 32 example: 8b14ed616aa4213ff418c78f987b6a5d x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true flash_container_status_ov2: title: flash_container_status description: Contains the results of flash container creation type: object properties: processing_status: description: >- Current status of the process as enumeration of the values "OPEN", "IN_PROGRESS", "DONE" and "FAILED" type: string enum: - OPEN - IN_PROGRESS - DONE - FAILED done_containers: description: >- Current number of progressed flash containers, which are ready for download type: integer example: 2 total_containers: description: 'Total number of flash containers, which has to be progressed' type: integer example: 4 target_ecu_meta: type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_meta_ov2' source_ecu_meta: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_meta_ov1' flash_containers: description: List of the created flash container type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/flash_container_ov2' required: - processing_status x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true vehicle_ov2: title: vehicle description: >- Multiple vehicle information according to the vehicle identification number (vin) type: object properties: vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true brand_name: description: > Brand name of the manufacturer describes the brand inside and outside of the Volkswagen Group (e.g. VOLKSWAGEN PKW). type: string maxLength: 255 example: VOLKSWAGEN PKW brand_code: description: > CL00003 Brand of the manufacturer. CL00441 contains all brand including VW Group's brands CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: V x-code-list: 'CL00003, CL00441, CL00309' model: $ref: '#/definitions/model_ov1_3' vehicle_ident: $ref: '#/definitions/vehicle_ident_ov1_2' drive_kind: $ref: '#/definitions/drive_kind_ov1_6' transmissions: description: Mutiple transmission data type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/transmission_ov1_6' engines: description: Mutiple engine data type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/engine_ov1_6' equipment_options: description: Mutiple equipment data type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/equipment_option_ov1_3' dealers: description: Multiple referenced dealer based on the defined role type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/dealer_ref_ov1_3' pkn: description: Production identification number (optional) type: string maxLength: 13 example: 15 8 5805 country_composition: description: > Country composition indicator, manufacturer dependent. PR number as indicator for country specific offer program like X3A for france. - CL(PRNumber) CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: X10 x-code-list: CL(PRNumber) country_composition_iso: description: > Registration country of the vehicle in ISO 3166 Alpha-2-Code based on country_composition PR number. Country composition ISO is based on TPL PR family (direct mapping with b-code-list). type: string example: FR colors: description: Multiple colors of the vehicle. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/color_ov1_6' life_data: $ref: '#/definitions/life_data_ov1_3' components: description: >- Technical components. This element defines an alternate view to the Vehicle. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/component_ov1_3' telematic_device: $ref: '#/definitions/telematic_device_ov1_3' data_expire_at: type: string format: date-time description: Timestamp of expire date example: '2015-05-28T14:07:17.000Z' sim: $ref: '#/definitions/sim_ov1_6' x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true vehicle_affiliation_ov2: title: vehicle_affiliation description: The affiliation contains the last known context for multiple vehicles. type: object properties: vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true affiliation: $ref: '#/definitions/affiliation_ov2' required: - vin - affiliation x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true vehicles_ov2: title: vehicles description: Informations about multiple vehicles by the given VINs type: object properties: multiple_vehicles: description: A list of vehicles type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/vehicle_ov2' x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true vehicles_affiliation_ov2: title: vehicles_affiliation description: Data object that contains information about multiple vehicle affiliation type: object properties: vehicles_affiliation: type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/vehicle_affiliation_ov2' minItems: 1 maxItems: 10000 required: - vehicles_affiliation x-object-version: 2 x-object-model: true
